results.title: Differentiated modulation of signaling molecules AMPK and SIRT1 in experimentally drug-induced hepatocyte injury.
results.journal: Biomed Pap Med Fac Univ Palacky Olomouc Czech Repub
results.text_hl: Previous experimental studies have shown that @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, less specific activators of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMP-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@) and @GENE_SIRT1 @GENE_309757 @@@sirtuin 1@@@ (@GENE_SIRT1 @GENE_309757 @@@SIRT1@@@), can effectively attenuate @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017114 @@@acute liver injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Njeka Wojnarova L, Kutinova Canova N, Arora M, Farghali H. Differentiated modulation of signaling molecules AMPK and SIRT1 in experimentally drug-induced hepatocyte injury. Biomed Pap Med Fac Univ Palacky Olomouc Czech Repub. 2022 Apr 12;():. PMID: 35416184

results.title: Antidiabetic drug metformin alleviates endotoxin-induced fulminant liver injury in mice.

results.title: Metformin suppresses intrahepatic coagulation activation in mice with lipopolysaccharide/D-galactosamine-induced fulminant hepatitis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ suppresses @DISEASE_Blood_Coagulation_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001778 @@@intrahepatic coagulation@@@ activation in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@lipopolysaccharide@@@/D-galactosamine-induced @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017114 @@@fulminant hepatitis@@@.
